website_summaries.verdict: This durable, firm mattress may not last many years, but it’s priced perfectly for those on a tight budget.
pros: Very firm for an all-foam mattress of its thickness
Expands quickly within a few hours of unpacking
Back and stomach sleepers appreciate its all-over support
cons: May be too firm for side sleepers
Foam emits noticeable odor when first unwrapped

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best things I've bought for myself. When I first opened it, it may be because the compression is a little soft, but after 72 hours, the support is enough. Was a little rough waiting 72 hours for it to completely rise but it was well worth the wait. It's firm yet soft if that makes sense. I just don't see the reason to spend thoughts of dollars on the brand name mattress when this is just fine. No complaints. Perfect item to have and package good, shipping fast.
customer_reviews.author: YAR

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and support for a true value price
customer_reviews.text: I have a very bad neck/back.i needed something firm/supportive, yet comfortable. This is perfect for us. My husband and I both fall asleep effortlessly, and it has really been beneficial to my back. I looked for a long long time at mattresses online. I was going to get a Purple or aTuft and Needle, but had a smaller budget. I’m so glad we took a chance with this one. So comfortable, with the support I need at a great price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I went from an IKEA bed to this, and it is so much more comfortable, it’s soft and you sink in, but it’s firm too. For the price compared to other memory foam mattresses I think this is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: wakinglennyup

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfort at half the cost of namebrand.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quick. It expanded to fullsize thickness in a few hours. The quality of the materials and stitching is very good. It is a firm mattress with just enough give. I find it very comfortable for a near 190lb side sleeper. I definitely recommend this mattress and the price makes it smart purchase compared to Purple, Nectar, etc. It does have a slight smell from being manufactured and sealed up for shipping, but that smell goes away in a few days of being in open air.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hezina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price!
customer_reviews.text: OK, not as soft as I want- but its pretty comfy. Shipped fast, unboxed and was professionally packaged, "filled out" rather quickly too. Has nice cover that unzips and has "grippy" matl on bottom so it doesn't slide around- good idea! Its a great buy, been comparing these for a while, although its more of a med/firm and I like med/soft.
customer_reviews.author: mick4tfd

customer_reviews.title: The best Mattress feels like I spent $1000 on it!
customer_reviews.text: People please read!! I’m a real person and this is a real review! I work on the train and my back has been killing me I knew I needed a new mattress but I didn’t want to spend $800 so I read so many review and I wasn’t gonna go with this one because it only had 30 reviews as oppose to other ones that have thousands but I took a chance and it sooooo impressed, please don’t hesitate, there’s no smell, the mattress doesn’t sink in, it’s a medium firm but still has a soft feel to it, and it instantly grew to its 10 inches, I’m soooo very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Mariam h.

customer_reviews.title: Extreme comfort for excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Using it in my guestroom and the guest don’t want to leave.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Molblly mattress
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE everything about this mattress. It is so comfortable and the price just can't be beat!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Baker

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We are testing this mattress out to replace our flimsy camper one! I opened the box by myself pretty easily and almost immediately it “inflated” to the ten inches. Slight smell but I have the windows open and fan going. I already think it’s better. We’re coming from a soft king size mattress and this is firmer but soft once you lay down. We are too excited to wait 72 hours but it laid out for several today. Will take off the sheets in the morning to allow it to breathe some more. Will report back on sleep!
customer_reviews.author: The Clines

customer_reviews.title: 10 inches is 10 inches
customer_reviews.text: I had concerns about whether or not this would be 10inches. I read reviews of some of the other foam mattresses were 2 inches shorter than advertised. Well this one is 10 inches. Basically 10 inches after an hour out of the box! Comfort was great and so was the price. I recommend getting this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Love it will buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bed I've ever bought it is awesome comfortable and I didn't had to wait 72hours to inflate it came on a box I really recommend everyone to buy .
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B.

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: I am somewhat disappointed with this mattress. I have slept on it for more than a month, and it's just not that comfortable. I would describe it as firm and unyielding. My mid-back muscles hurt in the morning, and I don't have any injuries. I would pass on this one. My previous mattress bought through Amazon for around the same price at least felt great to lay on for the first year. I don't see this one holding up and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Grill

customer_reviews.title: Good for back sleepers
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s decent quality and came packaged nicely. It was easy to open. I waited 48 hours for it to expand fully. The reason for my three stars is that it’s very firm. I wanted a medium mattress since I’m a side sleeper and my husband is a back sleeper. I’m waking up with sore shoulders now. :( I wish I could return it but it’s so much hassle considering it’s a large item. I’m going to get a mattress topper in hopes it will help.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki1721

customer_reviews.title: Saggy -SOFT and NOT ten inches
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely NOT ten inches . Left to inflate for a the whole day and still not more than 5-6 inches . No smell . Well packaged . Item is so soft it’s disgusting . It’s terribly painful and this is the 8th memory foam I’ve purchased so I can say I’m kinda experienced with memory foam . It’s it’s this soft now it’s only going to get more saggy w time .
customer_reviews.author: SuperMomma

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I can't complain, I bought this mattress for our guest room. The guest said it was great! I'm just waiting on the hubby and I to get into an argument so I can try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Bloom

customer_reviews.title: bed is not comfortable, I had gave an early review a few days after I received it
customer_reviews.text: Since I purchased this mattress. I had a couple nights of a comfortable sleep. After a week of sleeping the mattress became hard, makes my back problems worse in the morning, and it makes me feel hot every night, where now I have to sleep with a fan on all year. Nothing of what was promised in the advertising. I will purchase a cooling mattress top from a mattress store.
customer_reviews.author: praiseprincess

customer_reviews.title: Subpar peformance after a month
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these; one for me, one for my mom. Clearly a difference in that mine does not perform as advertised. Same construction, height of foams. etc... my top layer does not appear, nor react as gel memory foam. My mother's does. Mine causes a lot of morning back pains, my mother's does not (when I slept on it for a night). Hand compression and release test are not the same either. waste of money, now what?!
customer_reviews.author: JAZZY1

customer_reviews.title: The warranty is only for manufacturing defects upon receiving the bed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my mom. Great quality and as soon as we unwrap it the bed took it’s form immediately. If I had not bought it myself, I would’ve thought it was a regular mattress not a box bed. However, it’s a bit firmer than my mom wanted, so we bought a memory foam mattress topper from Sam’s Club for $100 and that was the perfect touch like a sundae with a cherry on top! I would definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: C. James

customer_reviews.title: Too firm
customer_reviews.text: This mattress seemed to meet all of our requirements for a good sleep. When it arrived and we gave it the 48-72 hours to return to it's normal size. We then tried to sleep on it with extreme discomfort. Maybe it just needed to be "broken in" a little, but the next night we could not get comfortable either. The third night we did not get any sleep at all. It is almost as firm as the platform it sat on. I do not like to leave negative reviews, but this was the worst sleep experience that I have ever had with a new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: lgoody

customer_reviews.title: Great value and so comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Sleeps like a pillow top as someone moving from a traditional mattress. Comfortable for back and side sleeping and a great price compared to a mattress store.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Did not expand, uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bed is lopsided because it did not fully expand after 72 hours, specifically on all 4 corners. You can feel every movement in this bed, if you sleep in it with another person you will be shaken around. Very disappointed and going to do what I can to be refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for my kids bed and noticed I bought a queen instead of full. I ended up using it since I needed a new one anyway. 😆Of course the mattress had a stench to it but what product isn't if it's new. I left it unzipped and air out the full 72 hours and expanded to 11in. The stench went away. Feels medium plush when you sit but not too much when you lay. Very very comfortable and was able to get some good sleep especially with my hip hurting and less tossing and turning....going to buy another one for my kids and the RIGHT size this time!😂
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress has the right amount of sink without trapping you within its depths. It does run very warm, even in early Spring in upstate NY I wake up sweating most mornings. BUT, I don't wake up sore which is far more important!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: great price.
customer_reviews.text: i love my new bed it is so comfortable and was here on time, it was the right size. the moment i cut the wrap it started to for didnt even take an hour that you.
customer_reviews.author: leydi

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: After going through mattresses on Walmart.com and going to costco, and searching Amazon I have found to me the best deal with out skipping comfort. Having bought a more expensive mattress previously these could be interchangeable. Things I noticed and liked about this matterss was the bottom has like little grips that help keep my sheets on. Delivery was amazing they brought it to my door and I live on the second floor in a apt building! So that was awesome. Also read the instructions on unpacking it comes with an opener. It has cool info on the company and how they like to make quality affordable products.
customer_reviews.author: Kesh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing mattress - especially at this price point. We own an expensive tempurpedic mattress and we know quality memory foam. This is quality! And you can’t beat getting it delivered to your door. My guests were the first ones to use it and they raved. I woke up in the middle of the night and couldn’t get back to sleep so I came into the guest room to watch tv. What a pleasant surprise to discover the guest bed is just as comfy as our master bedroom bed! (We have the queen, 10 inch model)
customer_reviews.author: jenniemommy

customer_reviews.title: Six month review
customer_reviews.text: *six month review* I knew this mattress would be on the firm side thanks to the reviews I read before purchase. Amazon fast delivery AND its lightweight which is very helpful, plus it does stay cool. Bottom has little anti slip bumps which work great! Two stars for that. Unfortunately this mattress is too hard, I added an amazing mattress topper (which I have on other beds) by a well known company and even that doesn’t make it better. Will likely get rid of this mattress, heavy travel for work makes me wish I’d come home to a comfy bed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: ZERO pressure Relief
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a month in advance of a camping trip for a motorhome bed and while it does fit the frame, this is an extremely stiff and firm mattress with zero pressure relief. We have other foam mattresses of a different brand I’d recommend, but NOT this one. the window for return closed OR I’d be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: bird

customer_reviews.title: Life changing mattress
customer_reviews.text: Waited a few weeks to write this review. After sleepless nights, tossing and turning to wake up to back aches every morning decided to try something different. This memory foam mattress is amazing. We topped it with a cool gel topper and bamboo mattress protector cover and honestly it is the best nights sleep I've had in years. Don't hesitate on your purchase of this product, you will be amazed once you sleep on it. We let it expand for two days before using it. Just follow the directions and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JSF

customer_reviews.title: Gonna need a new mattress this one is ruined after 3 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.text: I had high Hope's for this mattress. I got the 10 inch version. It took 3 days to inflate. I have slept on it for a few weeks now. The spot where I sleep instantly started to sag. The sag will not recover and is only getting worse. To the point where I am going to have to buy a new mattress. I am 5'10" and weight 165 lbs. The mattress is a failure. Now let's find out if they will take it back.
customer_reviews.author: MrMDK

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress after a lot of research and wanted to give this a try. I have had horrible quality of sleep, the customer service is really bad and they do not care about the customer. They're about the profit rather than the sleep quality and comfort this mattress provides. It does not have good support for your back and you will not be comfortable sleeping. I have slept on more comfortable $100 box mattresses from amazon. I have no gain from this review but I want to save you the money, go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ryaan I

customer_reviews.title: Took a bit, but now I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest, I was hesitant to go cheap on a mattress. I had a Serta pillow top previously and was having back pain every morning. I am a stomache sleeper. The first couple of nights on this one it did feel a little too firm, but by night 3 my back pain was gone and I get great sleep. Glad I saved money by getting this mattress and solved my back pain issues.
customer_reviews.author: Blitz84jc

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good choice.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I've been sleeping remarkably well since I got it. I'm a wee bit concerned that it seems to be getting a little mushy, but, I think it might be too early to tell since I've only had it for less than a month. I can say that it's a heckuva lot better than what I had and I paid a whole lot more for the old one than I did for this one. For the price, I'll probably get a new one when I redo the mattress in the spare bedroom. I've been able to get rid of the feather topper and the foam topper I used before. Overall, I would highly recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Larry F.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase of a memory foam bed and this one has been great for me. If you cannot sleep on a firm mattress this may not be good for you as this particular mattress is on the firm side. I personally prefer firm mattresses and this one hasn't disappointed. I've been waiting for sometime to write my review to see how the mattress holds up and so far after a few months have passed I can say this is a quality mattress. I find it very comfortable. If you're shopping for a semi firm mattress give this one a try. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rewster

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great price and amazing quality. We looked for a long time for a memory foam mattress but the prices were ridiculous, then we found this wonderful bed. I have a herniated disc and nerve damage and have never been more comfortable or slept as well as I do on this matress. The only problem we have found is that we don't want to get out of bed 😆. Everyone should have at least one of these beds. When this one wears out we will definitely be getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Delmer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The mattress arrived in a timely fashion, the packaging was good, the mattress didn't smell too bad, after a few days it seemed to fully uncompress well. It's a firm mattress but generally comfy BUT I have NEVER in my life experienced waking up in the middle of the night dripping with sweat and having the hot & cold sweats until sleeping on this mattress. Now I am super creeped out by whatever material this is made from and will probably try returning this if I can get it packaged up and if shipping doesn't exceed what I paid for this.
customer_reviews.author: sm

customer_reviews.title: Just read my review.
customer_reviews.text: So right out the gate this mattress was great, inflated super fast, hecka much comfy. Definitely recommend a good ol add to cart. However, beware, the plastic is muy slippery so while I was trying to put the mattress on the boxspringamajig I slipped on the plastic and broke my wrist and banged up my knee. I wish I was kidding but this is for real guys. Enjoy the mattress but watch out for that dastardly plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Erin r.

customer_reviews.title: Waters of money
customer_reviews.text: Really deceiving pics, thank you for wasting my money and my time. Officially done with Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Carol C. Luckenbach

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest purchase I have ever made online. This mattress is heavenly. I was so skeptical to buy a a foam mattress as I have always had a traditional mattress. I have bought a few other mattresses online for my rental properties that were very good, but not amazing. This one is the absolute best. And it was incredibly affordable. I have such a hard time staying asleep all night and since I have been using this, I have slept so great. It arrived on time, and gained its full form in a day. The new mattress smell was gone quickly. No damage. I’m just so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: My daughter said it’s a little softer than a Rock!
customer_reviews.text: I was previously sleeping on a 4-inch futon mattress and was excited to get this. It has been 6 weeks and I wake up aching all over every morning. This is way too firm and just uncomfortable! I’d rather sleep on the floor or the futon again. I tried a mattress topper paired with a blanket to try to add softness but it only helped minimally. So disappointed in this purchase -but I can’t afford to buy another new mattress right now! (I am a side sleeper so perhaps back sleepers will love this.) *It IS well-made and nice looking
customer_reviews.author: lucidbean

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with our new mattress, it arrived in a cardboard box, and its quite heavy. I am very happy that we only had to carry it up one flight of stairs. It came out of the packaging easily, and we allowed it to inflate 48 hours before we slept I n it. There was no odor, and provides amazing support. The first night I woke up in the same position as when I laid down, and no pain in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a Rock!
customer_reviews.text: I think they gave me the wrong one, It's hard as a rock and I ordered the medium. after letting it expand for 30 or so hours, it only got to be 8 inches. as of 11/7/19 still only 8 inches and sinking in the middle of bed, neck and shoulders hurts in morning. I do not recommend this one. update as of 3/21 still no better and not very comfortable. center of mattress sinks. will get a topper for it and it may make it better!
customer_reviews.author: DJSOUNDS

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Comfortable mattress, love it!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is amazing! Super comfortable and perfect softness and firmness. Once you try this, you'll never go back to any store bought mattress. It was delivered on time, we unpacked it carefully and left it to rise for a day and it rose in no time. It did have a faint chemical smell but we left it in the room with Windows open and within a few days that was gone too. We are very picky sleeper when it comes to beds and this one has been a pleasant surprise. I've slept on this for 12 hours straight and still woken up all fresh. Would definitely buy again and recommend to others. Price and quality, both are great!
customer_reviews.author: AmazUser

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it seems
customer_reviews.text: After spending a lot of time searching for a quality mattress I decided this product seemed best. After about a week sleeping on my mattress my back is killing me. I am 21 years old and have never had trouble with my back until the past few days (I’ve had the mattress for about a week and a half). My boyfriend has also noticed his back is sore when he wakes up. Disappointed that our new investment is hurting our bodies. Also after waiting for the mattress to expand, our 10 inch mattress is only about 7.5-8 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you don’t like sleeping on hills!
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase of my adult life. This mattress, if you lay near one of the edges, compresses and doesn’t fully decompress. So if you are on the side of the bed where the mattress compressed, then it’s like sleeping on a decline. Steep enough that you feel yourself sliding off the bed! Inexcusable. And we’re not heavyweights. 175 and 220 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Mcfadden

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: It’s been four days since I opened this mattress up, and it never expanded into an acceptable shape. Some corners and sides are thinner than others. Returning it. I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bel

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping on a rock
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and looked at a bunch of other mattresses before purchasing and I should have kept looking. It arrived in a big box, unopened the box and let the mattress expand for 2-3 weeks. Finally set it up, I was excited to try out my new king size bed and it’s like sleeping on a jail mattress. Very hard and very firm. It molds the shape of your body after a few minutes but if you move around like me, you move into a hard stiff mattress that takes to get comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Christian G.

customer_reviews.title: Another happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed for my mom as I’m trying to help her downsize her furniture. She was reluctant to give up her bed but once she slept on my memory foam mattress she sold on the idea of getting one of her own. I went ahead and got her a queen size bed which she was upset about. She always had king size beds. After letting her get use to her bed she did admit that the bed is comfortable and the size of her bed is growing on her.
customer_reviews.author: C. W.

customer_reviews.title: Mattress is firm but comfortable.  I have had more than a month.
customer_reviews.text: I have now had this mattress for a full month. It is firm and yet comfortable. Forms to my body. My husband and I weigh about 160 and 200 pounds. So far, there is no difference or sagging on either side of the mattress. I feel that I do sleep better. I can sleep on my side and am not sore. Well worth the price. I will buying these for my 3 children for birthdays this year. They were very impressed once this was fully puffed up.
customer_reviews.author: Paula lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Very firm bed & I love it
customer_reviews.text: 8.5/10 on the firmness scale. I love love love it! I am mid 20's - use to think I loved soft beds, now that we're older we all know the firmer the bed- the better it is for your body. Less aches, more support, etc. I bought this for my partner- a king size and we are both so happy with my selection. the bed is SOOOO firm, with just enough memory foam to hug my body just a bit. I'm a PT student so I def see the relief of pain this bed gives me. Sponsor me for another bed please so I can have my own, bless my spine.
customer_reviews.author: Cynn D

customer_reviews.title: Here's the thing...
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this mattress SO much. I sleep fine on it but here's the thing, my lower back hurts. It's much too hard for me! I was so excited about switching my from a spring to a gel foam and did THOROUGH research based on reviews. I was skeptical about ordering without physically trying it out. My body doesn't sink in like it's a cloud based off other reviews. I am a petite female who weighs under 150 but still!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bed will give you nightmares!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible horrible bed! No comfort constantly felt like I was falling out of bed. Unlike any other bed we had.wr actually had to buy a new bed a month later to save not only my marriage but my couch! They should call this bed the divorce mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Danenhower

customer_reviews.title: Buy this before you spend $1000 on another
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t imagine a better bed. I had the $1500 king size purple matteress for 3 years before I bought this bed. Don’t get me wrong the purple is a great bed but this $250 bed is super comfortable. Even my gf who is a massive complainer about beds likes it.
customer_reviews.author: andrew T.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Stop! Do not buy this mattress. As you lay down mattress goes all away down. I bought two. Unfortunately i cant returned this item, the frame time to returned was only three months; to be honest takes more than three months to realized, my back problem was dueto poor quality material. I am big women but my child is only six and average weight , she also complains Dont waste your money and gain back problem like i did. I lost my money! Dont loose yours.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable queen bed mattress, 10 inch gel memory foam
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our college student. It arrived quickly. She likes it. It is softer then I like. Good value for the money. It did not have a smell. I advised her to take it out of the packaging it arrived in and let air out flat for 24 hours which she did. I did also buy the Mainstays Heavy duty queen size slat bed frame from Walmart on line and a 4" Instant folding Low profile Queen sized box spring also on line at Walmart, to prolong the life of this gel mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica L. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: The first several nights were great. Then I started to wake with back and hip pain. It gradually got worse until this morning I could hardly get out of bed. I've only been sleeping on it for a month.
customer_reviews.author: nannk

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress Works with me...
customer_reviews.text: Yea I’m a real guy everyday working hard for the money yea wish it was less work but life good still; The mattress makes my sleep very great-fullness, Body gets the recharged to achieve another long working day for myself. I am Happy with this mattress purchase I made here on amazon. I know everyones body are different and everyones body calls out for a different mattress type to achive their well frest rest sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Sr.Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Shocked
customer_reviews.text: Buy this right now!! Seriously so shocked at how nice this mattress is. It is insanely comfortable with the perfect level of firmness. We bought this for our bed at our lake house and liked it so much we bought a second for the guest room. We have a pricier, “luxury” brand mattress at home and honestly this one is just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: For this price, the bed is phenomenal. I have to admit that I did something incredibly stupid. For the first few days, I'd been sleeping on the wrong side of the mattress. The instructions were unclear as to which side was the bottom and it didn't compute to me that the little rubber nubs would serve as grips on a platform bed (first time having one like this) so I'd been sleeping on top of that side after letting it rise for 72 hrs. Thanks to a nifty review on here I realized I needed to flip my bed over and I've been in heaven ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking at buying this mattress, DO IT!!! Soo worth it!!! We have bought expensive mattresses and those do not compare to this mattress! We are going to replace all of our mattresses with these throughout the house. Letting it “inflate” was easy. We laid it out and let it grow for 72 hours. Did not have a smell. Did not have any issues at all. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: LDBS2014

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The bed is comfortable! It only took about two days to fully puff up, and the smell was minimal, only lingering a few days. The bed warms up where you've been for a while, but quickly cool once you move. There's not much support on the edges, which can be expected, but can be shocking coming from a traditional box spring! I got the queen, which is great for one person, but can be tight for two unless you're sleeping right on each other.
customer_reviews.author: DONNA CORONA

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for those who want firm
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up. True to it's shape and width. Soft cover that I enjoy. It asked for pain relief rating? I don't get much pain relief from it but I don't think that that's supposed to be a quality. It's firm enough but I'd say if you are a person who likes their beds real firm, this won't do. However, for the price, it's pretty dang great!
customer_reviews.author: Mariangel Varela

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I won't lie, the product itself wasn't perfect; the mattress never did fully recover from being compressed (it's still a little bowed and shorter than 10"), however the customer service was outstanding. I received an instantaneous response to my email from an actual human being who seemed to actually care about the product. We easily came to an agreement to make up for the imperfections, and I'm left with an incredibly comfortable mattress at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: RChiller

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s odd going from a standard coil mattress but I’ve gotten used to it. This is VERY firm. But, I can lie on my side with no hip pain. The thing that bugs me is when you sit at the edge, it doesn’t support you. You just kind of roll off. I have fallen on the floor before I got used to that. Good value though!
customer_reviews.author: A Mo

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress! I purchased it because 3 of my friends have it and it's amazing and great quality! Such a low price too. I carried it upstairs/opened it up all by myself and I'm a 22-year old girl so not that strong hahaha. Didn't have any chemical smell which I was worried about. Definitely becomes a little bit firmer after a few days but I still find it extremely comfy. I also slept on it the first night which they say you shouldn't do but didn't have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Payten

customer_reviews.title: Firm, comfy, but a little smelly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old as her first big girl bed. She seems happy and is sleeping soundly all night. I didn’t want something too soft and it is definitely a more firm memory foam. I find myself laying down and wanting to nap in her bed quite often! I prefer firm but I don’t think it is by any means too firm as others have stated. The smell has lingered longer than I would like but I think I would still purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Haylee Holt

customer_reviews.title: You cannot trust good reviews.
customer_reviews.text: The Queen size mattress is supposed to be 10 inches it's barely 8 inches and I cannot return it the same way I received it. There was a smell that lasted nearly 3weeks. The mattress is not soft it's saggy. I had to purchase a firm topper to help me sleep comfortably and not experience lower back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress and love the price even more ! Just as comfy as some high end mattresses. Definitely a firmer memory foam. You don’t sink in too much. But my husband and I wake up in much less pain. My sister has the 14” and honestly the 10” feels about the same comfort level. So if you’re not concerned about the height I would say this one is just as good!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Too firm
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the price was great but the comfort is not. I’ve never written a review before, the mattress is so firm and I’ve had it for 3 months, I’m a side sleeper so softer mattresses help with pressure relief. Which I thought this mattress was more on the plush side 😪 if you’re a stomach sleeper this would be a great mattress due to the firmness.I feel bad for writing a review so negatively but just a future reference for anyone that likes a softer mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Finn

customer_reviews.title: Dip in bed
customer_reviews.text: Hade only a short time and there a dip in my mattress and I even waited the stupid two day to sleep on it got a queen size and I lay on my said and roll in to my wife because of the dip in the center of the bed
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Comfort at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for our guest room. Set up was simple - open up the plastic and leave the mattress alone. It did smell pretty strong so we opened the windows in the bedroom and turned on the fan on and off for about 4 days. My granny (75 years old) stayed with us for 3 nights. She liked it so much she asked me to order one for her. Hers was delivered last week and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Too hard
customer_reviews.text: I thought that being 10”, certainly it would be comfortable. We bought it for our RV and it sits on a wood platform. It’s just too hard. Used it for 3 nights of camping and I had back and hip pain (side sleeper) every night.
customer_reviews.author: okmichele

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and will put you to sleep
customer_reviews.text: First I like to say the mattress came sooner than expected which was perfect timing, I had guest in town. I brought this mattress for my guest room, opened it up and waited a few hours and everyone who slept on it said the same thing which was as soon as they laid down they fell to sleep quick due to the comfort of the mattress. I tried it out and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Swinson

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The first night after full decompression might feel awkward as the foam is a little stiff, but given a couple of hours it will conform for your body. The mattress came in a moderately sized box that we were able to fit in our car to get home. Easy to unwrap with the little opener included, just do so carefully. Allow the full 72+ hours for decompression. It's worth it. Highly comfortable. Husband felt shoulder relief after the first night. My hips quit hurting and my neck isn't stiff. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Neatherlin

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a Year
customer_reviews.text: I got this bed due to the "on the firm side" comments I saw. I was excited about that because I like a firmer bed. This thing didn't last a year! It's got a huge dip in the middle now. You sink right in and it's very uncomfortable. And I know it's not my bed frame or box spring, because its sitting on 3/4" plywood on top of my box spring. I tried reaching out to the company months ago asking if this was a flip-able bed or if there was a warranty but go no response. I ordered through my boyfriend's Amazon account and even he has seen no response.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hawkes

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I tend to buy mattresses in this price range simply because I rarely have the money to buy an expensive one. I must say, for the money, this is the best one I’ve ever owned. In all honey, I’ve laid on mattresses much more expensive than this one that weren’t half as comfortable. Definitely a great buy. Very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rj

customer_reviews.title: Firm but Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I should start off by saying that we were looking for a firm mattress. Reading the reviews it sounded like that was exactly what we were going to get. It was easy to peel apart. We let it fully expand for the 72+ hrs recommended. It did have a slight smell, but it dicepaded quickly after only a couple of hours. The top of the mattress is plush, but you do not sink in. You feel the sturdiness holding your back in perfect position. Overall, I am very happy with our purchase. Finally got some well deserved sleep. We haven't woken up this rested in a very long time. We have a new love affair, and it is our bed!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Queen Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase, great price. I bought this for a spare bedroom, but almost replaced my bedroom mattress. It's really comfortable. It was a bit weird at first because the mattress comes compressed. So you have to wait 72 hours before it gets to full size (10"). Amazing! It was so relaxing once fully expanded.
customer_reviews.author: golfnmachine

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy at all
customer_reviews.text: The mattress comes in a good package and we followed the instructions. It inflated to the full 10 inches after 24 hours. It looks nice and clean but for me personally It’s not comfortable and causes back pain to me and my husband. Not even medium firm as described.
customer_reviews.author: Basma

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Really glad I decided to purchase this item. I am a side sleeper and had a firm spring mattress for many years. I would constantly complain on hip pain and back pain. I was afraid when I first got this mattress but now, a week later I’ve never slept better. I don’t want to get out of bed! It arrived promptly and set up was super easy. It comes rolled and wrapped in a plastic and they provide a tool to slide it open. It took less than a day to inflate to 10 inches. Great buy for the $$
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Give time to exspand and this is an Amazing mattress
customer_reviews.text: Ok people, your doing great if you’re reading comments and trying too find that one mattress you don’t Regret buying!! Right? I bought this and I am sooo Excited too tell you I Absolutely Love this Mattress!! Don’t be discouraged after opening it and doesn’t get fully expanded for around 2 days! I slept on ours and it is Perfect!! I lay my head down and I’m out!! Just buy it! Oh and it’s firm but soft as well, I know that probably doesn’t help much but u definitely don’t sink which is a A+ but not a stiff bed either!! Can’t stop the praises on this bed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Perez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, firm... More of a medium firm. Hips and back would hurt in the morning, not anymore since sleeping on this mattress. I can't even feel my grandsons jumping on the bed. Great mattress for the money. I suggest any future buyers to get the mattress encasement here on Amazon... It will keep your mattress clean and in better shape
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good product!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buy this mattress and because it’s cheap it will not be good. Anyway it’s been about two weeks that I bought and it’s been amazing! I have bad back pain on my low back and this mattress it’s been working really good for I don’t wake up in pain. Its great for the price. We’re happy about it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great night sleep finally
customer_reviews.text: Was kinda skeptical about buying with some of the low reviews. However, wow total difference. I can sleep all night without tossing or turning. People complain about smell but if you follow directions leaving out 48-72hrs, it goes away and the bed firms up like its supposed too.
customer_reviews.author: Fred R

customer_reviews.title: Saggy
customer_reviews.text: The top portion and the bottom portion SAG it’s high in the middle does not look good on the bed. Requires you to use extra pillow to elevate your head. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: jtoler

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: I wear a v-go insulin pump. I thought with the pressure relief it would be fine. I change the pump every day from left to right side. When I lay on my side with the pump it is very painful and I am unable to sleep. IF I roll over in my sleep it starts to tear my pump away from my skin. There is no Hose in my pump I have the actual needle in my stomach at all times. I am not saying this isn't a good mattress. It is not a good mattress for me. Would love to send it back. But it is a bed in a box. Don't know how I would do that.
customer_reviews.author: Philip A Deysher / Betty Deysher

customer_reviews.title: odor for days
customer_reviews.text: well bought it for dad, he couldn't return it cause they wanted it on a crate, expensive to send back! odor remained for days .and this mattress is not cool at all as they advertise ..its a rip off ..at least i can say he doesn't have a coil sticking his back about it
customer_reviews.author: Laura  Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and good price
customer_reviews.text: I really believe that this is the best thing I ever bought in so long this is the best nights rest I have ever had and I will be ordering another one for everyone in my family
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress - especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have been sleeping on it for a few months now. I LOVE it! It feels hard when you first lay on it, but before you know it, your body sinks in to just the proper depth for your particular needs. It is amazing. Also I love that it has square corners, unlike my previous pillow top (which was $900+ and not near as comfortable as this) so the sheets stay on!
customer_reviews.author: A Best

customer_reviews.title: Bad don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Never buy again return if I could uneven after 5 days set up not 10 in more like 7.75 '9
customer_reviews.author: robert opitz

customer_reviews.title: Read the most recent negative reviews and there’s your answer
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve went with my gut feeling on this one, most recent negative reviews are spot on. This mattress never expanded to 10 inches, and that’s what I supposedly purchased. The corners are still flat after 5 days and the mattress only measures a little over 8 inches on the center edge. Do yourself a favor. If your thinking of buying this mattress, don’t waste your time with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable,Easy to transport,Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I live on a houseboat in Alaska where buying a mattress is expensive and hard to transport to our homes. This mattress was delivered within a week and was packaged compact and portable, great choice for remote cabins. I built a frame out of 2x4 and 2x6 for it while I waited for it to arrive. I opened it and slept on it the night it got here and have been happy with the comfort and support. Already my coworker has ordered one for his cabin and I am sure as the news spreads there will be more orders coming in. Thank you molblly
customer_reviews.author: Trevin

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Could not get comfortable. A friend recommended this mattress. I am not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Wroblewski

customer_reviews.title: Does not expand accurately, v. disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress since the beginning of January in my guest bedroom, it's been unused and I'm still short 3-4 inches off the advertised height of the mattress. What I would really like is to get some help figuring out what's wrong with the mattress and how to come up with a fix without having to go through the process of returning the mattress! I picked this one because of all of the ratings on it and now I'm second-guessing myself. Here's hoping to a turn-around.
customer_reviews.author: Warner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The bed is amazing! The bed is form yet soft. I was pleasantly surprised at this bed given the price point. It really is an amazing bed. It’s better than any other bed I’ve slept on. I would recommend to anyone looking for a good mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Mjdenee

customer_reviews.title: This helped with more restful sleeping!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize some of the back pain I was having were related to the mattress I had been using. The first night I slept on this mattress, I woke up and my lower back pain was pretty much completely gone. I've been using this mattress for just over two months and have loved it. I pretty much sleep in the same spot and don't have any worn spots showing where I've slept. For someone who also starts my sleep on my stomach, this is easy to mold to your body and still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Full size 10inch,, used it for a month now and love it, never slept on one before. It doesn’t seem to generate heat as I thought it would. And now I am not woken up at all hours of the night from the wife moving around and in and out of the bed . I recommend using your bed with box springs
customer_reviews.author: Josh  Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Nooo
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 0 I would! Unpacked it and 2 days later maybe 3 inches high! Then to return it you have to buy a special vacuum bag (buy 3 they rip easy) they to roll it and pack it just to get to the ups store !! DONT BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Bouchea

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality- more firm than soft.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good quality mattress but it’s not as soft as it says it supposed to be. I’m really trying but not completely convinced that I like it. At first it’s perfect but then you kind of sink in and feel the more solid layer. It’s not as hard as wood but it’s firm.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Lowry

customer_reviews.title: No way to know the memory form mattress density until you sleep on and no way to return
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't specify memory form density which is the form weight per cubic foot. My wife feel back muscle pain every morning, but those machine rolled mattress unable to roll back to package box and return.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Ch.

product_meta.title: Queen Mattress, Molblly 10 inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress with CertiPUR-US Bed Mattress in a Box for Sleep Cooler & Pressure Relief, Queen Size
feature_bullets: {MATERIAL & CONSTRUCTION}: Molblly 10 inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress is designed with three layers all-foam system, improving support and heat dissipation, mattress layers include 2 inches memory foam, 4 inches of comfortable layer, and 4 inches of high density base support foam for ultimate comfort. It includes a soft hypoallergenic cover layer that is washable for your convenience.
{HEALTH & HYPOALLERGENIC MATTRESS}: The foam has been certified by CertiPUR-US and Oeko-Tex Standard 100 without harmful substances like formaldehyde, mercury, and other heavy metals.

{COMFORTABLE & BREATHABLE}: All-foam bed design combined expertise and the best materials with advanced sleep technology. Memory foam conducive to continuous airflow & breathable; skin-friendly fabrics adapt to the environment to keep the mattress surface at the ideal sleeping temperature; Buoyant, no-sink support foams adapt and conform to your body for optimal pressure relief; Specialized foams reduce motion transfer of a partner so your sleep is undisturbed.

{EASY SHIPPING & SET-UP}: Mattress is compressed and packaged in a box for shipping, allowing it to easily be delivered to your door and expand to its full lofty shape inside your home. They fit all frames, such as box spring, floor, slatted base, flat platform or adjustable bed, hospital bed.

{ WARRANTY}: We are a manufacturer specializing in the production and processing of mattresses, guarantee the best price mattress you can get. Our bed mattress come with 10 years warranty. If for any reason you are unsatisfied, contact us at any time for support. NOTE: Please allow up to 72 hours for the mattress to fully expand and for any potential odors to dissipate. If the mattress you receive is under Ssecretland, please don't worry, Ssecretland is the sub-brand of Molblly.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,928 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
